Question: Portraying himself in a video, this person introduces museum guests to the genealogy wing of the museum.
Hints: This person hosted three Grammy Awards Telecasts: the 29th Grammys; the 30th Grammys; and the 31st Grammys.
William Edward "Billy" this person (born March 14, 1948) is an American actor, writer, producer, comedian, and film director.
This person's line in the film was "Mime is money." He later starred in the action comedy Running Scared (1986).
